title: ISS Daily Summary Report – 6/07/2024
summary: Boeing CST-100 Crewed Flight Test (CFT): Today, the CFT crew completed various post-docking activities to unload CFT cargo and configure the Starliner vehicle for quiescent operations. The crew performed Cargo Transfer, Centerline Camera and Tablet Battery Charging, a Nitrogen/Oxygen Resupply System (NORS) Mount Fit Test, and an Emergency Equipment Transfer and Checkout. Payloads: Immunity Assay: …
